page.title: 02A HOUSE IN WHEATHAMPSTEAD
page.content: In Wheathampstead there are lots of old and new houses. In the village, the houses are very old and small. Where I live the houses are all new. The estate was built in 1971. My house is made of concrete.It has stones on the front of it.The front garden is smaller than the back garden.My garden has a patio in the back.We have a wall and on the top there are some flowers.In the house there is a dining room and it has timbers on the walls.There is a hatch.The bathroom is quite big.The bedrooms are quite big . Two of them are smaller than the others.The kitchen is quite small.My bedroom has a television in it and also a record player as well.There are shelves on the wall. They have all kinds of books and lots of other things on them too.
